detail_desc: ZlideOn zip tab to quickly repair a broken zip in your favourite garment. Can be used with metal and plastic zips that are 5 mm wide when closed. These zips are often found in, for example, jeans. How to use: Remove the old zip tab and click on a ZlideOn tab of the right size and type.

Metal ZlideOn zip tab to quickly repair a broken zip in your favourite garment. Can be used with metal spiral/coil zips that are 4 mm wide when closed. These zips are often found in, for example, skirts, dresses, trousers and cushion covers. Remove the old zip tab and click on the ZlideOn tab.

Jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a fake fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Straight legs with wide, sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Heart-shaped earrings in metal with hoop pendants. Length 2.5 cm.
Round sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Ankle-length trousers in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a high waist, detachable tie belt, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and wide, straight legs.
Ankle-length trousers in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a high waist, detachable tie belt, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and wide, straight legs.
Thin metal rings, three decorated with pearly plastic beads.
Heart-shaped metal earrings. Size approx. 2 cm.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband and a shimmering metallic print on the legs.
Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in patterned satin. Double-breasted shirt with a shawl collar. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Shirt jacket in cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and two open front pockets. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Short, fitted, one-shoulder dress in ribbed jersey with two shoulder straps at one side. Unlined.
Shoulder bag in sturdy imitation leather with a suede flap, metal fastener and metal shoulder strap. Imitation leather inner compartment and a fabric lining. Size approx. 7.5x13.5x23 cm.
Shoulder bag in sturdy imitation leather with a suede flap, metal fastener and metal shoulder strap. Imitation leather inner compartment and a fabric lining. Size approx. 7.5x13.5x23 cm.
Shoulder bag in imitation leather with imitation suede side panels. Narrow shoulder strap, a zip at the top and one inner compartment. Size approx. 12x19x24 cm.
Shoulder bag in imitation leather with imitation suede side panels. Narrow shoulder strap, a zip at the top and one inner compartment. Size approx. 12x19x24 cm.
Short dress in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves and a seam at the waist with narrow, concealed elastication. Deep neckline and a double-layered front for easier nursing access.
Short dress in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves and a seam at the waist with narrow, concealed elastication. Deep neckline and a double-layered front for easier nursing access.

Short-sleeved jumpsuit in sturdy, super-narrow, ribbed jersey with a V-neck and buttons at the top. Seam at the waist with concealed elastication and a detachable tie belt, and straight, wide legs. Unlined.
Bucket hat in woven fabric. Width of brim 5.5 cm.

Calf-length skirt in soft, patterned viscose jersey. High waist with covered elastication, and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in soft, patterned viscose jersey. High waist with covered elastication, and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Straight-cut coat in a stretch weave with notch lapels, a button at the front and side pockets with a decorative flap and button. Unlined.

Boxy top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with decorative seams. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Wide jumper in a soft knit containing some wool. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Two-strand necklace in metal with pendants. Adjustable length, 41-49 cm.
Straight-cut biker jacket in soft imitation suede with a diagonal zip down the front, notch lapels with decorative press-studs, zipped front pockets and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. A pair of earrings made from recycled metal with coral-shaped pendants decorated with faceted glass rhinestones. Length approx. 5.5 cm.

Rectangular shoulder bag in imitation suede and imitation leather with a short shoulder strap attached by chain and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap. Flap with a magnetic press-stud and a zipped inner compartment. Satin lining. Depth 4 cm. Height 13 cm. Width 25.5 cm.

Rectangular shoulder bag in imitation suede and imitation leather with a short shoulder strap attached by chain and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap. Flap with a magnetic press-stud and a zipped inner compartment. Satin lining. Depth 4 cm. Height 13 cm. Width 25.5 cm.

Rectangular shoulder bag in imitation suede and imitation leather with a short shoulder strap attached by chain and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap. Flap with a magnetic press-stud and a zipped inner compartment. Satin lining. Depth 4 cm. Height 13 cm. Width 25.5 cm.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. A pair of clip earrings made partly from recycled metal. The earrings are decorated with thin chain pendants and beads made partly from recycled glass. Length approx. 3 cm, with pendants 5.5 cm.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. A pair of coral-shaped clip earrings made partly from recycled metal decorated with faceted glass rhinestones. Length approx. 4.5 cm.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Bead-embroidered rope bracelet made partly from recycled metal decorated with thin metal chains and beads made partly from recycled glass. Toggle clasp with a safety chain.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Large, round sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses. The plastic content of the frames is made partly from recycled PET bottles.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Coral-shaped hair pin made partly from recycled metal decorated with faceted glass rhinestones. Length approx. 15 cm.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Multifunctional hair accessory in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and silk weave with a large, sewn-on bow and long, wide ties. Can be worn as a classic hairband, as a scarf around a ponytail or as a tie belt. Length of ties approx. 74 cm.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Large ring made from recycled metal with a coral-shaped decoration.The ring is decorated with faceted glass rhinestones. Width approx. 3.5 cm.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Shoulder necklace made partly from recycled metal with coral-shaped chains decorated with faceted glass rhinestones. Clasp at the back of the neck.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Slides in satin made from recycled polyester decorated at the top with large knots in rope covered in recycled glass beads. Thermoplastic rubber soles.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Sandals in imitation leather made from Vegea™ and water-based polyurethane. Square toes, gathered foot straps and narrow tie straps. The tie straps have decorative metal pendants with faceted glass rhinestones. Thermoplastic rubber soles. Heel approx. 9 cm. VEGEA™ is an innovative, leather-like vegan material made from bio-waste produced during the winemaking process.

Calf-length dress in airy cotton poplin with a square neckline at the front and low-cut back with ties at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication, and gathered seams under the bust and at the hem for added width. Unlined.
High-waisted, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections. High waist with a wide waist panel.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Mosaic-patterned scarf in a silk and Tencel™ lyocell weave.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Patterned scarf in a silk and Tencel™ lyocell weave.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Small shoulder bag in imitation leather made from Vegea™ and water-based polyurethane that can also be used as a clutch. Concealed magnetic fastening at the top, a zipped inner compartment and a narrow, detachable shoulder chain. Zip at the sides with a metal tab in the shape of a bunch of grapes decorated with faceted glass rhinestones. Recycled polyester lining. VEGEA™ is an innovative, leather-like vegan material made from bio-waste produced during the winemaking process.
Soft, non-wired bras in jersey with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Elasticated hem. No fasteners.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, double-layered, drawstring hood, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Cap with a lightly padded front and mesh back. Covered elastication at the back.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, and covered elastication at the hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.

Sports shorts in fast-drying jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a concealed key pocket in the waistband and rounded hems with short slits in the sides.

Car coat in woven fabric with a collar, press-studs down the front and welt front pockets. Ventilating holes with eyelets under the arms, long sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Unlined with taped seams inside.

Straight-cut car coat in woven fabric with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and diagonal welt front pockets. Ventilating holes with eyelets under the arms and long sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs. One inner pocket with a press-stud, and a single back vent. Lined.

Straight-cut car coat in woven fabric with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and diagonal welt front pockets. Ventilating holes with eyelets under the arms and long sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs. One inner pocket with a press-stud, and a single back vent. Lined.
